1.infoText:
To participate in this game, we need your approval to record your GPS signal.
This information will also be used in scientific research on trajectory analysis.
No data will be shared from which can be detected which signal belongs to whom.

2.infoText:
You can now start the game.
First you will get some questions, which you will let you get to know the town. Every correct answer will be rewarded with information on the end point.

3.infoText: To win this game, you need to have the highest number of points. Each question belongs to a location. Points can be obtained by answering questions right, and as close as possible to that location. A question about the Oude Markt should therefore be answered at the Oude Markt, even if you know the answer without going there.

4.infoText: Furthermore, you will be awarded one point per GPS coordinate.

5.infoText: Mind you: when a team uses multiple devices, the number of points will be added up. We therefore recommend you to use as many devices as possible.

6.infoText: In case of a tie, the fastest team will be appointed as the winner.

7.infoText: When answering open questions, EVERY word of the answer shall start with a capital letter.
